# Castle (Building)
## Overview
**Castle**

**Create** 165 Goods, 31 Influence, 148 Labor, 2 Magic (7,390 gp)

**Rooms** 2 [[Armory (Room)|Armories]], 3 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedrooms]], 2 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Cell (Room)|Cell]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Crypt (Room)|Crypt]], 4 [[Defensive Wall (Room)|Defensive Walls]], 1 [[Drawbridge (Room)|Drawbridge]], 1 [[Escape Route (Room)|Escape Route]], 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Gatehouse (Room)|Gatehouse]], 1 [[Gauntlet (Room)|Gauntlet]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Stall (Room)|Stall]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]] 

An elaborate fortified home, a noble’s retreat, or the heart of a settlement’s defenses.
